xxl.core.util.random

Class JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.util.random.JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DiscreteRandomWrapper

    public class JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper
extends Object
implements DiscreteRandomWrapper
    Default implementation of RandomWrapper-interface. This class uses the Random-generator provided by Java.
    See Also:
    Random

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int maxValue
      the upper bound for the randomly generated discrete numbers
      protected Random random
      internally used pseudo random number generator

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper()
      Constructs a new wrapper for the pseudo random number generator provided by java.
      JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper(int maxValue)
      Constructs a new wrapper for the pseudo random number generator provided by java returning int values between 0 (inclusive) and maxValue (exclusive).
      JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper(long seed)
      Constructs a new wrapper for the pseudo random number generator provided by java using the given seed.
      JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper(long seed, int maxValue)
      Constructs a new wrapper for the pseudo random number generator provided by java using the given seed returning int values between 0 (inclusive) and maxValue (exclusive).
      JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper(Random random)
      Constructs a new wrapper for the given Random object.
      JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper(Random random, int maxValue)
      Constructs a new wrapper for the given Random object returning int values between 0 (inclusive) and maxValue (exclusive).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int nextInt()
      Returns the next pseudo-random, uniformly distributed integer value between 0.0 and Integer.MAX_VALUE from the java random number generator's sequence.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper

        public JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper(Random random,
                                 int maxValue)
        Constructs a new wrapper for the given Random object returning int values between 0 (inclusive) and maxValue (exclusive). If the given int is negative or zero, it is ignored.
        Parameters:
        random - pseudo random number generator.
        maxValue - the upper bound for the randomly generated discrete numbers.

      • JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper

        public JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper(Random random)
        Constructs a new wrapper for the given Random object.
        Parameters:
        random - pseudo random number generator.

      • JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper

        public JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper(long seed,
                                 int maxValue)
        Constructs a new wrapper for the pseudo random number generator provided by java using the given seed returning int values between 0 (inclusive) and maxValue (exclusive). If the given int is negative or zero, it is ignored.
        Parameters:
        seed - parameter for random number generator
        maxValue - the upper bound for the randomly generated discrete numbers.

      • JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper

        public JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper(long seed)
        Constructs a new wrapper for the pseudo random number generator provided by java using the given seed.
        Parameters:
        seed - parameter for random number generator

      • JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper

        public JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper(int maxValue)
        Constructs a new wrapper for the pseudo random number generator provided by java returning int values between 0 (inclusive) and maxValue (exclusive). If the given int is negative or zero, it is ignored.
        Parameters:
        maxValue - the upper bound for the randomly generated discrete numbers.

      • JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper

        public JavaDiscreteRandomWrapper()
        Constructs a new wrapper for the pseudo random number generator provided by java.

    • Method Detail

      • nextInt

        public int nextInt()
        Returns the next pseudo-random, uniformly distributed integer value between 0.0 and Integer.MAX_VALUE from the java random number generator's sequence. The method nextInt is implemented as follows: 

                public int nextInt(){
                return Math.abs(random.nextInt());
        }

        Specified by:
        nextInt in interface DiscreteRandomWrapper
        Returns:
        the next pseudorandom, uniformly distributed integer value between 0 and Integer.MAX_VALUE from the java random number generator's sequence.
        See Also:
        nextInt(), DiscreteRandomWrapper
